name: .IK File Extension
summary: Learn about .IK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by the CryENGINE SDK, a program suite used for building 3D games; saves inverse kinematics (IK) data, which specifies character joint positions and movements; edited with the 3D application included with the SDK.

content: NOTE: As of version 3.3, CryENGINE now merges the .IK, .CAL and .SETUP files into a single .CHRPARAMS file. Therefore, IK files are no longer used.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
